item.title: LLVM学习之一搭建
item.description: 探索 先进入官方文档看看 About — LLVM 10 documentation 介绍的话我还没看，我现在要先把环境搭起来，所以我来到了下面 The LLVM Getting Started documentation may be out of date. The Clang Getting Started page might have more accurate information. This is an example workflow and configuration to get and build the LLVM source: Checkout LLVM (including related subprojects like Clang): git clone https://github.com/llvm/llvm-project.git Or, on windows, git clone --config core.autocrlf=false https://github.com/llvm/llvm-project.git Configure and build LLVM and Clang:. cd llvm-project mkdir build cd build cmake -G <generator> [options] .
